about.me: Locally owned and operated by partners and employees of a small IT shop on the Alabama Gulf Coast, USA. Specializing in open-source network support, for small to medium sized businesses along the Gulf Coast.
about.server: Redundant 1Gbps fiber feeds, Quad Core Xeon, 20GB RAM dedicated servers; hosted in our very own, small, private datacenter. We have 3 relay nodes (1 unlisted) in 2 separate locations and spare block producer at each site.
